text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Alejandro González won the title by defeating Máximo González 7–5, 1–6, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Copa San Juan Gobierno - Singles 2014 Singles
title: 2014 Copa Gobierno de Córdoba – Singles
